title: Metal free C–O bond cleavage: a new strategy for the synthesis of substituted oxazoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28210-28214
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05122J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shengwang Li, Guiqin Liu, Zheyan Zhang, Ruiling Chen, Haiying Tian, Huifeng Wang, Xiuling Chen
A strategy for C–O bond cleavage of ester for the synthesis of substituted oxazoles was developed. The synthesis proceeded smoothly under metal-free conditions, combining C–O bond cleavage, C–N and C–O bond formation in one pot.
